review: We are a non-cable family and long-time prime members.  We always used to watch netflix through our playstation, but I never hooked up my amazon prime account to the playstation out of laziness.  This arrived and we just plugged it into the TV and we were ready to go with all the amazon prime tv and movies!  It's easier and faster to move through than the playstation as well.  We haven't done too much with the apps, but were able to watch Monday night football through the espn app, which we wouldn't have been able to get on our regular TV.  The fire stick also puts on a nice screensaver of changing landscape phots and then puts my TV to sleep after about a half hour if we aren't actively watching a program or using an app.  Very cool and worth $40.
